00042 ObjectiveFunction* VarianceTemplate::clone() const
00043   { return new VarianceTemplate(*this); }
00044   
00045 void VarianceTemplate::clear()
00046 {
00047   mCount = 0;
00048   mSum = mSqrSum = 0;
00049   saveCount = 0;
00050   saveSum = saveSqrSum = 0;
00051 }
00052 
00053 void VarianceTemplate::accumulate( double sum, 
00054                                    double sqr_sum,
00055                                    size_t count, 
00056                                    EvalType type,
00057                                    double& result_sum,
00058                                    double& result_sqr,
00059                                    size_t& global_count )
00060 {
00061   switch (type) 
00062   {
00063     case CALCULATE:
00064       result_sum = sum;
00065       result_sqr = sqr_sum;
00066       global_count = count;
00067       break;
00068     
00069     case ACCUMULATE:
00070       result_sum = mSum += sum;
00071       result_sqr = mSqrSum += sqr_sum;
00072       global_count = mCount += count;
00073       break;
00074     
00075     case SAVE:
00076       saveSum = sum;
00077       saveSqrSum = sqr_sum;
00078       saveCount = count;
00079       result_sum = mSum;
00080       result_sqr = mSqrSum;
00081       global_count = mCount;
00082       break;
00083     
00084     case UPDATE:
00085       mSum -= saveSum;
00086       mSqrSum -= saveSqrSum;
00087       mCount -= saveCount;
00088       result_sum = mSum += saveSum = sum;
00089       result_sqr = mSqrSum += saveSqrSum = sqr_sum;
00090       global_count = mCount += saveCount = count;
00091       break;
00092     
00093     case TEMPORARY:
00094       result_sum = mSum - saveSum + sum;
00095       result_sqr = mSqrSum - saveSqrSum + sqr_sum;
00096       global_count = mCount + count - saveCount;
00097       break;
00098   }
00099 }
00100 
00101 bool VarianceTemplate::evaluate( EvalType type, 
00102                                PatchData& pd,
00103                                double& value_out,
00104                                bool free,
00105                                MsqError& err )
00106 {
00107   QualityMetric* qm = get_quality_metric();
00108   if (type == ObjectiveFunction::ACCUMULATE)
00109     qm->get_single_pass( pd, qmHandles, free, err );
00110   else
00111     qm->get_evaluations( pd, qmHandles, free, err );  
00112   MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00113   
00114     // calculate OF value for just the patch
00115   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i;
00116   double value, sum = 0.0, sqr = 0.0;
00117   for (i = qmHandles.begin(); i != qmHandles.end(); ++i)
00118   {
00119     bool result = qm->evaluate( pd, *i, value, err );
00120     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !result)
00121       return false;
00122     
00123     sum += value;
00124     sqr += value*value;
00125   }
00126   
00127     // get overall OF value, update member data, etc.
00128   size_t n;
00129   accumulate( sum, sqr, qmHandles.size(), type, sum, sqr, n );
00130 
00131     // don't divide by zero
00132   if (n < 1) { 
00133     value_out = 0.0;
00134     return true;
00135   }
00136   
00137   const double rms = sqr/n;
00138   const double avg = sum/n;
00139   value_out = qm->get_negate_flag() * (rms - avg*avg);
00140   return true;
00141 }
00142 
00143 bool VarianceTemplate::evaluate_with_gradient( EvalType type, 
00144                                              PatchData& pd,
00145                                              double& value_out,
00146                                              std::vector<Vector3D>& grad_out,
00147                                              MsqError& err )
00148 {
00149   QualityMetric* qm = get_quality_metric();
00150   qm->get_evaluations( pd, qmHandles, OF_FREE_EVALS_ONLY, err );  MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00151   
00152     // zero gradient data
00153   grad_out.clear();     // store sum of metric * gradient of metric, and later OF gradient
00154   grad_out.resize( pd.num_free_vertices(), Vector3D(0.0,0.0,0.0) );
00155   gradSum.clear();  // store sum of gradients of metrics
00156   gradSum.resize( pd.num_free_vertices(), Vector3D(0.0,0.0,0.0) );
00157   
00158     // calculate OF value and gradient for just the patch
00159   Matrix3D op;
00160   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i;
00161   double value, sum = 0.0, sqr = 0.0;
00162   for (i = qmHandles.begin(); i != qmHandles.end(); ++i)
00163   {
00164     bool result = qm->evaluate_with_gradient( pd, *i, value, mIndices, mGradient, err );
00165     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !result)
00166       return false;
00167     if (fabs(value) < DBL_EPSILON)
00168       continue;
00169     
00170     sum += value;
00171     sqr += value*value;
00172 
00173     for (size_t j = 0; j < mIndices.size(); ++j) {
00174       const size_t r = mIndices[j];
00175       gradSum[r] += mGradient[j];
00176       mGradient[j] *= value;
00177       grad_out[r] += mGradient[j];
00178     }
00179   }
00180   
00181     // update accumulated values (if doing BCD)
00182   size_t n;
00183   accumulate( sum, sqr, qmHandles.size(), type, sum, sqr, n );
00184 
00185     // don't divide by zero
00186   if (n < 1) {
00187     value_out = 0.0;
00188     grad_out.clear();
00189     grad_out.resize( pd.num_free_vertices(), Vector3D(0.0,0.0,0.0) );
00190     return true;
00191   }
00192 
00193     // calculate OF value
00194   const double rms = sqr/n;
00195   const double avg = sum/n;
00196   value_out = qm->get_negate_flag() * (rms - avg*avg);
00197   
00198     // Finish calculation of gradient and Hessian
00199   const double f = qm->get_negate_flag() * 2.0/n;
00200   for (size_t k = 0; k < pd.num_free_vertices(); ++k) {
00201     gradSum[k] *= avg;
00202     grad_out[k] -= gradSum[k];
00203     grad_out[k] *= f;
00204   }
00205     
00206   return true;
00207 }
00208 
00209 bool VarianceTemplate::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( EvalType type, 
00210                                         PatchData& pd,
00211                                         double& value_out,
00212                                         std::vector<Vector3D>& grad_out,
00213                                         std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& hess_diag_out,
00214                                         MsqError& err )
00215 {
00216   QualityMetric* qm = get_quality_metric();
00217   qm->get_evaluations( pd, qmHandles, OF_FREE_EVALS_ONLY, err );  MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00218   
00219     // zero gradient and Hessian data
00220   grad_out.clear();     // store sum of metric * gradient of metric, and later OF gradient
00221   grad_out.resize( pd.num_free_vertices(), Vector3D(0.0,0.0,0.0) );
00222   gradSum.clear();  // store sum of gradients of metrics
00223   gradSum.resize( pd.num_free_vertices(), Vector3D(0.0,0.0,0.0) );
00224   hessSum.clear();     // store sum of Hessians of metrics
00225   hessSum.resize( pd.num_free_vertices(), SymMatrix3D(0.0) );
00226   hess_diag_out.clear(); // store sum of metric * outer_product(metric gradient), and later OF Hessian
00227   hess_diag_out.resize( pd.num_free_vertices(), SymMatrix3D(0.0) );
00228   
00229     // calculate OF value and gradient for just the patch
00230   Matrix3D op;
00231   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i;
00232   double value, sum = 0.0, sqr = 0.0;
00233   for (i = qmHandles.begin(); i != qmHandles.end(); ++i)
00234   {
00235     bool result = qm->evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( pd, *i, value, mIndices, mGradient, mHessDiag, err );
00236     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !result)
00237       return false;
00238     if (fabs(value) < DBL_EPSILON)
00239       continue;
00240     
00241     sum += value;
00242     sqr += value*value;
00243 
00244     for (size_t j = 0; j < mIndices.size(); ++j) {
00245       const size_t r = mIndices[j];
00246  
00247       hessSum[r] += mHessDiag[j];
00248       hess_diag_out[r] += outer( mGradient[j] );
00249       mHessDiag[j] *= value;
00250       hess_diag_out[r] += mHessDiag[j];
00251       
00252       gradSum[r] += mGradient[j];
00253       mGradient[j] *= value;
00254       grad_out[r] += mGradient[j];
00255     }
00256   }
00257   
00258     // update accumulated values (if doing BCD)
00259   size_t n;
00260   accumulate( sum, sqr, qmHandles.size(), type, sum, sqr, n );
00261   
00262     // don't divide by zero
00263   if (n < 1) { 
00264     value_out = 0.0;
00265     grad_out.clear();
00266     grad_out.resize( pd.num_free_vertices(), Vector3D(0.0,0.0,0.0) );
00267     hess_diag_out.clear();
00268     hess_diag_out.resize( pd.num_free_vertices(), SymMatrix3D(0.0) );
00269     return true;
00270   }
00271 
00272     // calculate OF value
00273   const double rms = sqr/n;
00274   const double avg = sum/n;
00275   value_out = qm->get_negate_flag() * (rms - avg*avg);
00276   
00277     // Finish calculation of gradient and Hessian
00278   const double inv_n = 1.0/n;
00279   const double f = qm->get_negate_flag() * 2.0/n;
00280   for (size_t k = 0; k < pd.num_free_vertices(); ++k) {
00281     hessSum[k] *= avg;
00282     hess_diag_out[k] -= hessSum[k];
00283     hess_diag_out[k] -= inv_n * outer( gradSum[k] );
00284     hess_diag_out[k] *= f;
00285     
00286     gradSum[k] *= avg;
00287     grad_out[k] -= gradSum[k];
00288     grad_out[k] *= f;
00289   }
00290     
00291   return true;
00292 }
